HashGolds

4120 Edmunds Street · Glover Park, DC 20007 · (202) 674-8031 · Hashgolds@email.com

Home of family raised Golden Retrievers. I’m the breeder behind Hashgolds Golden Retrievers located in Washington, DC. Our dogs excel both in and out of the show ring. They are excellent representations of the breed and have wonderful temperaments. It is our goal to produce healthy, show-quality puppies with wonderful temperaments. With this in mind, we consider a variety of factors when making breeding decisions, and we only breed dogs that are exemplary representations of the standard. We provide each of our dogs and puppies with the best care, and we ensure each pup that we don’t keep goes to a responsible, loving home.

Boys

Santiago De Himmelstein

American, Canadian & Indian Champion

Born in Santiago Chile. Moved to India as a 3 month old puppy and later went onto finish titles in India, America and Canada. Finished as #1 Golden Retriever of Canada in 2019

Trinity's Theon

Completed American Championship at 18 months

Theon is a son of Multi Country champion Santiago and American Champion Chevy. Has very strong bloodlines. Has a lot of potential and will be campaigned extensively across America 2024 show season.

Girls

Siomha Jurel

Indian & Thailand Champion
Siomha was born to the #1 & #2 ranked Golden retrievers of 2016 in Argentina. She completed her Indian and Thailand titles before she turned 16 months.

Litters

We breed upto a maximum of 2 litters a year. We have a long waiting list but we are always open to enquiries. We have a planned litter expected October 2023. Please get in touch if you would like to get on our waiting list.
We breed upto a maximum of 2 litters a year. We have a long waiting list but we are always open to enquiries. We have a planned litter expected October 2023. Please get in touch if you would like to get on our waiting list.
Health Testing
  • OFA Hips
  • OFA Elbows
  • OFA Eyes
  • OFA Heart

Awards & Certifications

  • 1 st Place - 2019 GRCA National
  • 1 st Place - 2020 GRCC National
  • GRCA club member
  • FAST CAT Titles
